name: Cyber 3077(2020 Proc Jam)
description:
It is the year 3077 and hostile ships have come flooding out of a mysterious wormhole! They seemed to be fused together in formation, for some odd reason. Tasked with dealing with the threat but fiercely outnumbered, you try to take as many of them down with you as you can!

Earn upgrades to empower your ship!

Survive as long as you can!

(Created for Procjam 2020)
